SELECT P.P_CODE AS P_CODE, A.PRJ_NAME AS PRJ_NAME, P.TITLE AS TITLE, P.CONTENT AS CONTENT, P.VIEWS AS VIEWS , ( SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) AS PORTFOLIO_LIKE FROM POFOL_UP PU2 INNER JOIN PORTFOLIO PF2 ON PU2.P_CODE = PF2.P_CODE WHERE PF2.P_CODE = P.P_CODE ) AS HEARTS
FROM PORTFOLIO P, C_PROJECT C, APP_OPENING A, POFOL_UP U WHERE P.CP_CODE = C.CP_CODE AND C.AP_CODE = A.AP_CODE AND P.P_CODE = U.P_CODE(+) GROUP BY P.P_CODE, A.PRJ_NAME, P.TITLE, P.CONTENT, P.VIEWS
